contextId.information: AT: "and the sweet smelling smoke of all the powders that merchants sell." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: with all the powders sold by merchants

contextId.information: AT: "Each man was supposed to give Solomon a thousand shekels as payment for the fruit of the vineyard." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: Each one was to bring a thousand shekels of silver for its fruit
